index.html.pagetitle: GlassCherry CMS - A sample site index page

page-subtitle.help: Some descriptive help text. Perhaps sepcifying the kind of content or advised word count for this field.

strap-line.value: An unopinionated content management system which helps the author without hurting the developer
strap-line.label: Cheeky strap line

step-1-copy.value: Use your usual dev tools to create your HTML. We don't care about which technologies you use.
step-1-copy.label: Step one description

step-2-title.value: Identify elements to be cherry-picked by the CMS
step-2-title.label: Step two title

step-2-copy.value: Mark elements which content authors will be able to edit using data attributes.
step-2-copy.label: Step two description

step-3-title.value: Let GlassCherry generate an admin site for you
step-3-title.label: Step three title

step-5-copy.value: You updated site source can fit back into your deployment process or get published directly. We can push the changes to your git repository, to Amazon S3, to GitHub Pages, or to SFTP.
step-5-copy.label: Step five description
